shopping.name: Chengdu Taikoo Li (成都远洋太古里)
shopping.location: 中纱帽街8号, Jinjiang District, Chengdu
shopping.notes: Evening stroll location. Mix of luxury brands and trendy boutiques. Open-air design, great atmosphere. Open until 10pm. Home to fashion retailers, lifestyle stores, and specialty shops.

shopping.name: POP MART Nanjing Road Store
shopping.location: Nanjing East Road Pedestrian Street, Huangpu District, Shanghai
shopping.notes: Flagship store for blind box collectibles and designer toys. Wide selection of series including Molly, Dimoo, Labubu. Great for cute collectibles. Multiple locations on Nanjing Road.

shopping.name: TOP TOY (潮玩集合店)
shopping.location: Various locations in People's Square and Nanjing Road area
shopping.notes: Alternative to Popmart. Designer toys and collectibles. More affordable than Popmart. Multiple series and collaborations. Check WeChat for exact locations.

shopping.name: X11 Shopping Center (兴业太古汇)
shopping.location: No.789 South Nanjing Road, Huangpu District, Shanghai
shopping.notes: Upscale mall near Nanjing Road. Fashion brands, niche boutiques. Less crowded than main Nanjing Road. Good mix of international and local brands. Open 10am-10pm.

shopping.name: Taikoo Li Qiantan (前滩太古里)
shopping.notes: Newer upscale shopping complex. Fashion retailers and lifestyle stores. More modern than Nanjing Road. Less touristy. Metro accessible. Open until 10pm.

shopping.name: Anken Green (安垦)
shopping.notes: Niche lifestyle boutique. Fashion accessories, stationery, home goods. Instagram-worthy. Popular with young locals. Verify location via Dianping or WeChat.

shopping.name: Wudaokou Shopping District
shopping.notes: University area shopping. Youth fashion, affordable clothing. Close to Tsinghua/Peking University. Ideal for evening after girlfriend's class. Open late.

shopping.name: Wudaokou Shopping District
shopping.notes: University area shopping. Youth fashion, affordable clothing. Close to Tsinghua/Peking University. Ideal for evening after girlfriend's class. Open late.

shopping.name: 798 Art District Shops
shopping.location: 798 Art Zone, Jiuxianqiao Road, Chaoyang District
shopping.notes: Art galleries with boutique shops. Unique fashion items, accessories, designer goods. Creative atmosphere. Great for photography. Open 10am-6pm typically.

shopping.name: POP MART Beijing Sanlitun Store
shopping.notes: Flagship store in trendy Sanlitun area. Same blind box collectibles as Shanghai. Wide selection. Good for cute collectibles. Open 10am-10pm.

shopping.name: Sanlitun Village (三里屯太古里)
shopping.notes: Beijing's trendiest shopping area. Fashion brands, lifestyle stores. Great for fashion shopping. Mix of luxury and mid-range. Open-air design. Open until 10pm.

shopping.name: Solana Lifestyle Shopping Park
shopping.location: No.6 Chaoyang Park Road, Chaoyang District
shopping.notes: Upscale lifestyle mall. Fashion, accessories, specialty stores. Less crowded than Sanlitun. Good atmosphere. Near Chaoyang Park. Open 10am-10pm.

shopping.name: Nanluoguxiang Side Streets
shopping.notes: Small boutiques and craft shops in historic hutongs. Unique fashion items, accessories. Affordable. Authentic local shopping. Avoid main tourist alley, explore side streets.

shopping.name: University Area Shopping
shopping.notes: Evening shopping after girlfriend's class. Local shops, youth fashion. Affordable clothing and accessories. Good for comfort zone exploration.

shopping.name: University Area Shopping
shopping.notes: Evening shopping after girlfriend's class. Local shops, youth fashion. Affordable clothing and accessories. Good for comfort zone exploration.

shopping.name: University Area Shopping
shopping.notes: Evening shopping after girlfriend's class. Local shops, youth fashion. Affordable clothing and accessories. Good for comfort zone exploration.

shopping.name: SKP Beijing (华贸天地)
shopping.notes: High-end luxury shopping for final day. International designer brands. Premium shopping experience. Good for memorable purchases. Open 10am-10pm.

shopping.name: Galeries Lafayette Beijing
shopping.notes: French department store with fashion and accessories. Good for final shopping. Quality items. Less crowded than SKP. Open 10am-10pm.

shopping.name: Local Tea Shops (茶叶店)
shopping.notes: Purchase Chinese tea as gifts/souvenirs. Authentic local products. Good for memorable items. Ask for packaging suitable for air travel. Quality varies by shop.

notes: Shopping recommendations focus on girlfriend's interests: cute toy shops (Popmart, TOP TOY), fashion items, niche boutiques. Shopping not a priority but options provided for key days. Budget estimates are allocation for potential purchases (not fixed prices). Most stores accept Alipay/WeChat Pay, some accept international credit cards. For Popmart and toy stores, blind boxes typically cost 59-79 RMB each. Fashion items vary widely (200-2000 RMB range). University area shopping (Days 11, 12, 17-19) provides convenient evening options after girlfriend's classes. Main shopping days are Day 7 (Shanghai), Day 14 (Beijing), and Day 20 (final day). Verify store locations and hours via Dianping (大众点评) or Gaode Maps before visiting. Many boutique stores may have irregular hours. RedNote MCP server unavailable due to Playwright dependency issue - recommendations based on well-known shopping locations.
